function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Extrapolation of results may not accurately represent the entire danish population","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of individuals with chronic conditions and psychiatric conditions in the study sample","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extrapolation of results to the entire danish population based on a sample of 3508 individuals","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of confidence intervals to generate lower and upper bound estimates","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of overadjustment due to adjusting for prior healthcare costs and predisposing variables","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of biased results due to two-step modeling approach","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of misinterpreting categorical variables in the models","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of healthcare cost data","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of prevalence estimates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete data on income","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of contagious psychiatric conditions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete assessment of physical activity level","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cross-tabulation analysis reported moderate agreement with operational definitions of flourishing, potentially indicating subjective interpretation of the criteria.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Coding criteria for positive characteristics, functioning, and emotion are complex and open to subjective interpretation, potentially leading to inconsistent coding and scoring.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliability of the flourishing scale and ess data may be called into question if the operational definitions and coding criteria are unclear or inconsistently applied.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Healthcare costs omitted for services not related to illness treatment, such as contraceptive management and other circumstances","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sickness benefit transfers not accounted for in the analysis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anonymized data may still pose privacy risks","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of implied consent for survey risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding the potential return on investment from programs and policies promoting mental health and well-being","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High hedonic well-being and low eudaimonic well-being","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-prospective studies with non-randomized
